movies.title: The Lord Of The Rings
movies.review: This is the best movie ever. We had a ton of fun that night and many people were dressed in costume!

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.review: Lame at parts, but generally terrifying

movies.title: Love Actually
movies.review: A holiday staple, this movie is sweet and funny. I enjoy it every time.

movies.title: Nacho Libre
movies.review: Always make me laugh and cheers me up when I need it.

movies.title: Mama
movies.review: Had some scary parts but overall pretty dumb.

movies.title: Requiem For A Dream
movies.review: Great movie although a bit depressing. Definitely scared me off of drugs!

movies.title: Serenity
movies.review: Such a great movie. Hard to put it in the action category because it is so many things. Love it love it.

movies.title: Face/Off
movies.review: Loved this movie as a kid but found it pretty bad as an adult.

movies.title: Monster's Ball
movies.review: A great and moving movie about horrible people. Always love Heath Ledger.

movies.title: Napolean Dynamite
movies.review: Funny and weird. Had a great time.
